summary: An ex-con with ulterior motives convinces the struggling inheritor of a sawmill to use convicts as affordable lumberjacks.
cast: Bourvil|Lino Ventura|Marie Dubois|Jess Hahn|Jean-Claude Rolland|Hénia Suchar|Reine Courtois|Nick Stephanini|Roger Jacquet|Marc Eyraud|François Vibert|Mick Besson|Michel Charrel|Michel Constantin|Paul Crauchet|Henri Czarniak|Pierre Frag|Marcel Pérès|Frédéric Santaya|Guy Henry|Marcel Bernier|Michel Bernier|Georges Guéret|Sylvain Levignac
title: Los rufianes
